pr_title: Existing CreateElement fixes exposed as CodeActions in LSP

timeline.message: Make CreateElement fixes available as LSP CodeActions.
Generate Overrride method puts in misleading comment - fixed.

timeline.bodyText:
This might deserve some versioning, but there is implementation dependency in java.lsp.server anyway:
                    <code-name-base>org.netbeans.modules.java.hints</code-name-base>
                    <build-prerequisite/>
                    <compile-dependency/>
                    <run-dependency>
                        <release-version>1</release-version>
                        <implementation-version/>
                    </run-dependency>
timeline.author: JaroslavTulach
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,32 @@

+package org.netbeans.modules.java.hints.errors;
+
+import java.io.IOException;
+import org.netbeans.api.java.source.ModificationResult;
+import org.netbeans.spi.editor.hints.Fix;
+
+/**
+ *
+ * @author Dusan Balek
+ */
+public abstract class CreateFixBase implements Fix {
